semantic_documents.content: Global marketplace connecting independent artisans and crafters with buyers seeking unique handmade goods. Features custom shop management, inventory tracking, and direct messaging between sellers and customers.

React with Redux for state management in seller dashboard. Node.js/GraphQL API for flexible product queries. PostgreSQL for transactional data, Elasticsearch for product search across millions of listings.

assets.readme: Microservices architecture with separate services for shops, orders, and search.
